Automatic

card.name: Faria, the Sacred Queen
card.expansion: Starter Deck "Faria, the Sacred Queen and Melgis, the Flame King"
card.text:
Activate
[W][W]: You gain 200 life.
card.flavor_text: The Sacred Queen Faria, the one who ruled upon Gloria, The Holy Land, was a honest and pure person. Her servants' loyalty to her was supreme. She hated the war, but the people of Gloria thought that she was the most suitable to rule the Seven Kingdoms.
card.all_sets: Starter Deck "Faria, the Sacred Queen and Melgis, the Flame King"
